snippet: In an attempt to enliven the mood and build attendance in one of the N.H.L.'s smallest markets, the Senators are trying to foster the atmosphere of an avid soccer crowd for home games.
abstract: Small market Ottawa Senators are trying to build attendance by fostering an atmosphere of avid soccer crowd for home games; for 10 games, select tickets in Section 319 will be sold through Facebook and Twitter pages of Red Scarf Union, fan group modeled after those popular in English soccer, at discounts of 50 percent or more; fans who buy those tickets have an understanding they are expected to cheer loudly and have fun.
lead_paragraph: In an attempt to enliven the mood and build attendance in one of the N.H.L.'s smallest markets, the Senators are trying to foster the atmosphere of an avid soccer crowd for home games.

headline.main: Ottawa Senators Are Welcoming an N.H.L. Crowd in Soccer’s Image
headline.print_headline: A Hockey Crowd in Soccer’s Image
